page.title: 07Education
page.content: Education Children in the area attend St. Weonard's Primary School. That in Llanwarne closed many years ago and became a village hall and that in Pencoyd was converted to a home. The number of pupils is lO5, just short of the ll0 required to qualify for another teacher. They travel by school bus. For secondary education school buses take them to John Kyrle School,Ross (8 miles), or to Kingstone School (8 miles), or to Bishop's C. of E. School, Hereford (8 miles). They may attend the Haberdasher's School, Monmouth (l0 miles), the Cathedral School, Hereford, or St. Mary's Catholic School, Lugwardine. These are all Independent. VI Form studies occur at Hereford Tech., John Kyrle and the Independent schools.
